title: Answering phone and turning on speaker phone, both via one voice command?
content:
An old Samsung phone I had had a fantastic option for answering the phone.

When the phone rang you simply said:  “Answer” and the call would be answered and speaker phone turned on.  No more running and falling over furniture to answer the phone manually.

How about it Google...why not this way of answering the phone for your older less spry customers ☺
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
